ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New, lost, confused, aiyee....
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks!  I can t remember what server I m on. This weekend is a bit kooky as the husband and I are throwing our annual Halloween bash Saturday night.  I might
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks!  I can't remember what server I'm on. 
 
This weekend is a bit kooky as the husband and I are throwing our annual Halloween bash Saturday night.  I might be on sometime Sunday, but that's our anniversary.  =P
 
I'm definitely going to look you up, though.  Thanks again, and to everybody who's replied so far.  =)
 


Dave Lyles <dwlyles@...> wrote:
Hiya Jennifer,
I'm an old D&D player as well, and yup, an old fart. 
First, what server are you on?  I play on Lany's.  As you are only level 3, you can create another character on my server if you wish and I'll help you.  I remember when I first started I couldn't even find food and drink.  I'll bet you still do the newbie shuffle....hehe, bouncing off walls etc.  It's all well and good to know these other help areas, but kinda hard when you don't even know what they are talking about.  And the game has it's own language...ty, atm, afk, etc.  The group I typically play with is gone to the fanfair this weekend, so I have lots of help time atm = at the moment.  I'll be on most the weekend starting Fri by 3pm PST.  Just send me a tell = push T, it will say. .../tell.......then type so it says...../tell Tokool hi, this is Jennifer, and I'll know who you are.
 
Tokool 62 druid, Lany's server
----- Original Message -----
From: Jennifer Dury
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, October 28, 2004 12:52 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] New, lost, confused, aiyee....



Hey there...

Finally succumbed and bought the "platinum edition" (you may all
laugh derisively now).  I'm level 3, and completely lost.  I'm mainly
a Runescape player, played D & D in my day (yes, I'm an old fart),
and basically I'm looking for help.  I have no idea what the merry
hell I'm doing.

Hi!  Hope to meet you all and talk soon...


Jennifer
